description: Commands to manage container registry information of a Container App Job.

commands.name: az containerapp job registry list
commands.summary: List container registries configured in a Container App Job.
examples: az containerapp job registry list -n my-containerapp-job -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az containerapp job registry remove
commands.summary: Remove a container registry's details in a Container App Job.
examples: az containerapp job registry remove -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --server MyContainerappRegistry.azurecr.io

commands.name: az containerapp job registry set
commands.summary: Add or update a container registry's details in a Container App Job.
examples:
az containerapp job registry set -n my-containerapp-job -g MyResourceGroup \
    --server MyContainerappJobRegistry.azurecr.io --username MyRegistryUsername --password MyRegistryPassword

commands.name: az containerapp job registry set
commands.summary: Add or update a container registry's details in a Container App Job.
examples:
az containerapp job registry set -n my-containerapp-job -g MyResourceGroup \
    --server MyContainerappJobRegistry.azurecr.io --username MyRegistryUsername --password MyRegistryPassword

az containerapp job registry set -n my-containerapp-job -g MyResourceGroup \
    --server MyContainerappJobRegistry.azurecr.io --identity system-environment

commands.name: az containerapp job registry show
commands.summary: Show details of a container registry from a Container App Job.
examples: az containerapp job registry show -n my-containerapp-job -g MyResourceGroup --server MyContainerappJobRegistry.azurecr.io
